sn54.10:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā kimilāyaṃ viharati veḷuvane.
sn54.10:4.3: Tatra kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ kimilaṃ āmantesi:
sn54.10:4.4: “kathaṃ bhāvito nu kho, kimila, ānāpānassatisamādhi kathaṃ bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso”ti?
sn54.10:5.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā kimilo tuṇhī ahosi.
sn54.10:5.3: tatiyampi kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ kimilaṃ āmantesi:
sn54.10:5.4: “kathaṃ bhāvito nu kho, kimila, ānāpānassatisamādhi kathaṃ bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso”ti?
sn54.10:5.5: Tatiyampi kho āyasmā kimilo tuṇhī ahosi.
sn54.10:6.1: Evaṃ vutte, āyasmā ānando bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn54.10:6.4: Yaṃ bhagavā ānāpānassatisamādhiṃ bhāseyya, bhagavato sutvā bhikkhū dhāressantī”ti.
sn54.10:7.3: “Evaṃ, bhante”ti kho āyasmā ānando bhagavato paccassosi.
sn54.10:7.5: “kathaṃ bhāvito ca, ānanda, ānāpānassatisamādhi kathaṃ bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso?
sn54.10:7.6: Idhānanda, bhikkhu araññagato vā rukkhamūlagato vā suññāgāragato vā nisīdati pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ujuṃ kāyaṃ paṇidhāya parimukhaṃ satiṃ upaṭṭhapetvā.
sn54.10:7.7: So satova assasati, satova passasati … pe …
sn54.10:7.9: Evaṃ bhāvito kho, ānanda, ānāpānassatisamādhi evaṃ bahulīkato mahapphalo hoti mahānisaṃso.
sn54.10:8.1: Yasmiṃ samaye, ānanda, bhikkhu dīghaṃ vā assasanto ‘dīghaṃ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, dīghaṃ vā passasanto ‘dīghaṃ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
sn54.10:8.2: rassaṃ vā assasanto ‘rassaṃ assasāmī’ti pajānāti, rassaṃ vā passasanto ‘rassaṃ passasāmī’ti pajānāti;
sn54.10:8.4: ‘passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘passambhayaṃ kāyasaṅkhāraṃ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati—
sn54.10:8.5: kāye kāyānupassī, ānanda, bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn54.10:8.9: Tasmātihānanda, kāye kāyānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn54.10:9.1: Yasmiṃ samaye, ānanda, bhikkhu ‘pītippaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘pītippaṭisaṃvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
sn54.10:9.5: vedanāsu vedanānupassī, ānanda, bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn54.10:9.8: assāsapassāsānaṃ sādhukaṃ manasikāraṃ.
sn54.10:9.9: Tasmātihānanda, vedanāsu vedanānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. (2)
sn54.10:10.1: Yasmiṃ samaye, ānanda, bhikkhu ‘cittappaṭisaṃvedī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘cittappaṭisaṃvedī passasissāmī’ti sikkhati;
sn54.10:10.4: ‘vimocayaṃ cittaṃ assasissāmī’ti sikkhati, ‘vimocayaṃ cittaṃ passasissāmī’ti sikkhati—
sn54.10:10.5: citte cittānupassī, ānanda, bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn54.10:10.7: Nāhaṃ, ānanda, muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānāpānassatisamādhibhāvanaṃ vadāmi.
sn54.10:10.8: Tasmātihānanda, citte cittānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. (3)
sn54.10:11.1: Yasmiṃ samaye, ānanda, bhikkhu ‘aniccānupassī assasissāmī’ti sikkhati … pe …
sn54.10:11.5: dhammesu dhammānupassī, ānanda, bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ.
sn54.10:11.6: So yaṃ taṃ hoti abhijjhādomanassānaṃ pahānaṃ taṃ paññāya disvā sādhukaṃ ajjhupekkhitā hoti.
sn54.10:11.7: Tasmātihānanda, dhammesu dhammānupassī bhikkhu tasmiṃ samaye viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā, vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ. (4)
sn54.10:12.1: Seyyathāpi, ānanda, catumahāpathe mahāpaṃsupuñjo.
sn54.10:12.2: Puratthimāya cepi disāyaṃ āgaccheyya sakaṭaṃ vā ratho vā, upahanateva taṃ paṃsupuñjaṃ;
sn54.10:12.5: dakkhiṇāya cepi disāya āgaccheyya sakaṭaṃ vā ratho vā, upahanateva taṃ paṃsupuñjaṃ.
sn54.10:12.6: Evameva kho, ānanda, bhikkhu kāye kāyānupassī viharantopi upahanateva pāpake akusale dhamme;
sn54.10:12.9: dhammesu dhammānupassī viharantopi upahanateva pāpake akusale dhamme”ti.
